author: gstein
msg: Fix up the log functionality to properly deal with provided paths.
Patch by: Ben Collins <bcollins@debian.org>
* libsvn_fs/tree.c (svn_fs_revisions_changed): Change to take an array
of 'const char *' for paths instead of one path. It will then
iterate to get a list of all revs for all paths (reduces amount of
trails for getting info on multiple paths).
* include/svn_fs.h (svn_fs_revisions_changed): Updated decleration and
comments for svn_fs_revisions_changed.
* svnadmin/main.c (main): Updated use of svn_fs_revisions_changed for
lscr.
* tests/libsvn_fs/fs-test.c (revisions_changed): Likewise.
* libsvn_subr/sorts.c (svn_sort_compare_revisions): New function for
sorting an array of revisions.
* include/svn_sorts.h (svn_sort_compare_revisions): New declaration.
* libsvn_repos/log.c (svn_repos_get_logs): Make use of newly modified
svn_fs_revisions_changed. We pass it the paths passed to us (if
any). The returned array of revs is then used to trim down the
logs to just those that the caller is interested in.
* libsvn_client/log.c (svn_client_log): Enable the parsing and usage of
complete URL's. For now, passing a URL alone is unsupported. User
must pass a URL plus paths.
* cmdline/main.c: Update usage info for log command. Also, allow -D
option for logs. This works with ra_local, but ra_dav doesn't have
the required function yet.
* man/svn.1 (log): Update usage of log command.

author: gstein
msg: Add a new function to get the "basename" of a given path. This
function operates similar to the "basename" command in Unix
environments.
* include/svn_path.h (svn_path_basename): add doc and declaration
* libsvn_subr/path.c (svn_path_basename): new function. implement.
* tests/libsvn_subr/path-test.c (test_basename): new function to test
the svn_path_basename() function.
(test_funcs[]): add test_basename

author: gstein
msg: Fix a small compiler warning, reported by Blair Zajac <blair@orcaware.com>
* strings-table.c (locate_key): cast the DBT->data field to a char* to
match the "%s" format

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/add-cmd.c
(svn_cl__add): Use an iteration subpool.

author: rooneg
msg: Another tweak to the new editor stuff, pointed out by Greg Stein.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/default_editor.c
(make_file_baton): allocate file_pool out of the edit baton's pool, not out
of the dir baton's pool, so files can live longer than the enclosing
directory.
